VI.ii.4.C.3.b
.
How RPCs Notify ROs of Necessary Award Adjustments
RPCs use letters and forms to advise ROs of any necessary award adjustments.
Note
:  RPCs do
not
return copies of
VA Form 21-651,
Election of Compensation in Lieu of Retired Pay or Waiver of Retired Pay to Secure Compensation From Department of Veterans Affairs (38 U.S.C. 5304(a)-5305)
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section C - Coordinating Military Retired Pay (MRP) Cases With Retired Pay Centers (RPCs) and Service Departments
